about_the_game:
In the era of the end of the law, the aura is getting thinner and thinner, the chaos in the world is frequent, the Tao has disappeared and the devil has grown up, and the fate of the world has come to an end. A group of living beings are pursuing the legend of the ancient immortals, hoping to ascend to transcendence and obtain eternal life.
1、Open world, randomly generated map
2、Multiplayer cooperation (10-20 people), you can explore alone, but also with your buddies to adventure, fight, explore the secret world;
3、Ground combat/fighting, etc. You can also build your own territory on land;

Specific play:
1、Cave, clan
2、Building, farming
3、Smithing, alchemy
4、Magic treasures, techniques, formations
5、random map generation, demonic beast fighting, etc.

short_description: What is Immortal is a multiplayer sandbox game with Chinese Immortal Cultivation culture. Players take on the role of a cultivator, exploring, cultivating, refining and other events, during which they will realize the true meaning of "seeking immortality", "the great way" and "longevity".
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
